title: BOSS Men's Paddy Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
description: Regular fit polo shirt with three-button placket

Blending functional engineering with distinctive design, this regular-fit polo is a versatile active wear staple. Its innovative fast-drying technology provides reliable moisture management, and the active stretch fabric is crafted with eco-friendly fibers for high-performance odor control. Finished with short sleeves, a three-button placket and fresh, colorful tipping to the collar, it can take you easily from the golf course to weekend activities.
